stories.title: Compass Points Toward Adventure
stories.intended_reader: Travelers interested in upcoming expedition ships
stories.core_insight: Compass will guide Celebrity's expedition expansion
stories.markdown:
**A compass points the way. Celebrity Compass will guide expedition travelers to new adventures.**

[Celebrity Compass](/ships/celebrity-cruises/celebrity-compass.html) is planned as part of Celebrity's expedition fleet expansion. Following Xpedition, Flora, and Seeker, Compass will help establish expedition cruising as core to Celebrity's identity.

The name suggests navigation—finding paths to experiences, guiding travelers toward adventure, orienting journeys into the unknown. The expedition philosophy continues.

Details will emerge as launch approaches. The vision is clear—premium expedition cruising expanding to serve growing demand.

**The promise:** Compass will guide Celebrity travelers to new expedition destinations. Another step in the expedition journey.

Those drawn to expedition should watch Compass develop. A ship named for showing the way.

stories.title: Expedition Fleet Growing
stories.core_insight: Compass shows Celebrity's commitment to expedition
stories.markdown:
**Four expedition ships signal serious commitment.**

[Celebrity Compass](/ships/celebrity-cruises/celebrity-compass.html) joining Xpedition, Flora, and Seeker means Celebrity's expedition fleet will be substantial. This isn't experimental—it's strategy.

The demand exists. The Galápagos success proved the concept. Expanding to four ships means new destinations become possible. The expedition future Celebrity envisions is taking shape.

**The commitment:** Compass represents Celebrity betting on expedition's future. The investment signals where the line sees opportunity.

Those who believe expedition cruising is the future will find evidence in Compass. The fleet that proves the commitment.
